name: Spintop Brawl: The toys war
description:
This game was made by a team of 5 Game Design students at ISART Digital Paris in 2nd year.

We were asked to make a 3D Brawler but we added a bit of platforming.

Bare in mind that this game is in French, we may add English in the distant future.

You can use the settings menu ("Paramètres") and enable/disable X and Y auto recentering for the camera and also invert X and Y axis.

  • Game Designers :
    • Amaury GUILLET (@amospec)
    • Basile HUBERT (@millot)
    • Quentin BINETRUY (@nit-co-games)
    • Tristan LEFEVRE (@drgloutsch)
    • Alan GARCIA CALZADA (@alan-xyphire)
